text: Five little penguins went swimming one day
Down in the bay where the penguins play
Mommy penguins said hey, come back
But only Four little penguins came back
Four little penguins went swimming one day
Down in the bay where the penguins play
Mommy penguins said hey, come back
But only Three little penguins came back
Three little penguins went swimming one day
Down in the bay where the penguins play
Mommy penguins said hey, come back
But only Two little penguins came back
Two little penguins went swimming one day
Down in the bay where the penguins play
Mommy penguins said hey, come back
But only One little penguins came back
One little penguins went swimming one day
Down in the bay where the penguins play
Mommy penguins said hey, come back
But no little penguins came swimming back
No little penguins went swimming one day
Down in the bay where the penguins play
Daddy penguins said hey, come back
And all the little penguins came swimming back!
